definition[0]: a useful machine, tool, instrument etc that has been invented
example[0]: The dishwasher is a wonderful invention.
example[1]: The invention of the computer has revolutionized the business world.
definition[2]: a story, explanation etc that is not true
example[2]: They subsequently admitted that the story was pure invention.
definition[3]: the ability to think of new and clever ideas
example[3]: With such powers of invention, he should get a job easily.
definition[4]: a new product that was not available before
example[4]: Do you realise that the paint roller is a Canadian invention?
example[5]: There were displays ofnew inventions in the exhibition halls.
definition[5]: when something is made or designed for the first time
example[6]: Cars had been made in Birmingham since their invention.
example[7]: the invention by Citibank of certificates of deposit
